> #Train the neural network
> #Going to have C(5, 4, 3) hidden layers
> #Threshold is a numeric value specifying the threshold for the partial
> #derivatives of the error function as stopping criteria.
> net.price <- neuralnet(Cena~Matryca+JasnoscEkranu+CzasReakcji, trainingdata, hidden=c(5, 4, 3), threshold=0.001)
> print(net.price)
$call

    data = trainingdata, hidden = c(5, 4, 3), threshold = 0.001)

$err.fct
function (x, y) 
{
    1/2 * (y - x)^2
}
<bytecode: 0x0000000008eea790>
<environment: 0x0000000006ceda08>

$act.fct
function (x) 
{
    1/(1 + exp(-x))
}
